# Gender Disparities in Hiring & Political Influence  
### A 2024 Job Market Analysis by Team 5

We investigate how gender disparities intersect with industry, geography, and political context.  
Our analysis blends Lightcast job postings, FRED macroeconomic indicators, and academic research to understand how the 2024 job market shapes real career outcomes.
